TopicTitle: I wanted to make KSP compatible music...

Articles.Content:
Then this happened. I stepped it back from EWQL and used Nexus instead (samples match closer) but ultimately in the end the fanfare in me took over and also I wanted electric guitar...soooo all in all, Love the sound but doesn't quite go. Although I wish there were more tracks in game. I still play with music down\off

But I digress, here is the link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vA9OdUh5Z0I

Let me know what you think of the track "Space Landing"
I'm listening to it now, it's eerie, soothing, epic, and, argh! It's so good!!
